scenario: You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining TikTok to a confused peasant from the year 1400.
You are a cat trying to convince a dog that the vacuum cleaner is a friendly robot.
You are an alien ordering a pizza, but you only know English from gangster movies.
You are a superhero whose only power is summoning aggressive geese.
